commit.message:
ipa-inline.c (edge_badness): Use inlined_time instead of inline_summaries->get.

	* ipa-inline.c (edge_badness): Use inlined_time instead of
	inline_summaries->get.

From-SVN: r248334

files.patch:

+	inline_summaries->get.
